info.name: New Youtube Dark 2017
info.description: Dark theme for Youtube new interface (August 2017).
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

version 0.4
- Fixes for the October version.

version 0.3
- Reduced the brightness in the check mark
- New promotional poster

version 0.2.3
- Fixed the comment input
- Fixed the step zero text

version 0.2.2
- Fixed the youtube verified icon 
- Fixed the Log In promo text

---------------------------------------------------------

Currently under active development. Any comments are welcome :) orlandotrejo [at] usb [dot] ve

data.title: cant see what im typing in the comments
